0.1.name: wordpress/stronger-github-widget
0.1.description:
You can display :

  • Repositories
  • Subscriptions
  • Events
  • Starred
  • Followers
  • Following

It uses a server cache to be very light and fast on your WordPress installation.

It verifies the username on saving settings.

Don't hesitate to ask me new features or report bugs on potsky.com !

I don't code these GitHub events because I did't find any informations about the json structure :

  • GollumEvent
  • MemberEvent
  • PublicEvent
  • TeamAddEvent

So if you want a better display for these events, send my an API url with these events. Something like : https://api.github.com/users/MAGICALUSER/events
